channel.title: Double-Click updater fails to execute F7 GFX disable
channel.description:
With Mopar's updater, hitting F7 is recognized because "Graphics now Disabled" and "Graphics now Enabled" comes up in the console, but the graphics disable doesnt actually do anything.
Just somthing to point out
<3 MOpAr

If you know anything about java/regex just open defs/definitions.txt and fix the gfx toggle definition
